Posts.Content: ckern wrote: I am trying to decide if I want to go through chemotherapy or not. I ma 45 years old and went through a total mastectomy of my left breast. My path report was tumor 4.5 cm, node negative, ER/PR positive, HER2 negative stage IIa.Â  I heard about a test called Oncotype dx and was wondering if anyone else had this test done. If so how long ago and was it worth the info? Dx 7/15/2008, ILC, 4cm, Stage IIA, Grade 1, 0/7 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Oncotype DX ckern Coltsneck
